meanings.definition: An impressive display or range of a particular type of thing.
meanings.sent1: The store had a beautiful array of flowers for sale.
meanings.sent2: The artist's array of paintings was breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The array of colorful balloons made the party feel magical.
meanings.sent4: The array of stars in the night sky was like a sparkling blanket.
meanings.sent5: The array of desserts at the buffet tempted everyone's taste buds.

meanings.sent1: The books on the shelf were in a neat array.
meanings.sent2: The array of numbers was organized from smallest to largest.
meanings.sent3: The array of ducks following their mother was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The array of dominoes falling one after the other was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The array of colors in the rainbow was a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: To set out in a line or in an orderly manner.
meanings.sent1: She would array the toys on the shelf neatly.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers would array themselves in formation.
meanings.sent3: He would array his collection of action figures in funny poses.
meanings.sent4: The trees would array themselves along the path like guardians.
meanings.sent5: The chef would array the ingredients before starting to cook.
